details.description_text: Brand: LAV Origin: Turkey Material: European Crystal Glass Product: Frosty Sandy Cup Pack: Single Piece Capacity: 305 ml Series: Frosty Style: Round Height: 123 mm Color: Clear Features: Subtle design, sturdy, durable, break-resistant, non-toxic, dishwasher safe, recyclable LAV Frosty Sandy Cup – Elegant, Durable, and Eco-FriendlyElevate your drinking experience with the LAV Frosty Sandy Cup, a perfect blend of style, functionality, and sustainability. Crafted in Turkey from high-quality European crystal glass, this cup is designed to impress with its subtle and refined design. Whether you're enjoying a refreshing beverage at home or hosting a gathering, the LAV Frosty Sandy Cup is a stylish and practical choice.Key Features: ✅ Premium Quality: Made from durable, break-resistant European crystal glass, ensuring long-lasting use. ✅ Subtle & Refined Design: Features a clear, elegant design that complements any table setting or decor. ✅ Generous Capacity: Each cup holds 305 ml, making it perfect for a variety of beverages, from water and juice to cocktails and smoothies. ✅ Safe & Non-Toxic: Made from high-quality, food-safe materials, ensuring peace of mind with every use. ✅ Dishwasher Safe: Easy to clean and maintain, making it a convenient addition to your kitchenware collection. ✅ Eco-Friendly: 100% recyclable and environmentally friendly, aligning with sustainable living practices. ✅ Stylish & Functional: Combines modern aesthetics with practicality, making it ideal for everyday use or special occasions.Why Choose LAV Frosty Sandy Cup? The LAV Frosty Sandy Cup is more than just a drinking glass – it’s a statement of elegance and sustainability. Its high-quality construction ensures durability, while its sleek and clear design adds a touch of sophistication to any occasion. Perfect for personal use or as a thoughtful gift for friends and family, this cup is a must-have for anyone who values style, functionality, and eco-conscious living.Add the LAV Frosty Sandy Cup to your cart today and enjoy your favorite beverages in a cup that’s as stylish as it is sustainable!

product_title: Latest model colorful juice mog for any kind of person.

detail.name: Latest model colorful juice mog for any kind of person.

details.description_text: Product details of Latest model colorful juice mog for any kind of person. The mug is constructed with double-walled insulation filled with crackle gel that can go in the freezer and keep your drink extra cold while you enjoy it! The unique gel creates a frosty appearance between your beverage and the mug. Whether used for a perfect gift or used by you, it is a wonderful choice! Made of a BPA-free acrylic material, the mugs are safe to use for just about any beverage. For Best Results, please place mugs upside down in the freezer for 2-4 hours. Pour your beer in and enjoy! Never water down your beverage with ice again with these freezer mugs! Freezing Gel keeps your beverage colder longer than freezer mugs with freezing liquid rather than freezing gel. The ice mups can be regarded as a gift for your family and friends, also, the best choice for Mother's day.
